_header: Sigh and sorrow deeply / mourn and weep inwardly
Bibliographic Ghosts: Oxford, Bodleian Library Laud misc. 673 (SC 505), f. 219v.

BodLatLitE17.First Lines: Syke and sorow depelymorne and wepe inwardly…
BodLatLitE17.Last Lines:
…loue and long contynualyand þou schalt ioy
                    endlesly

BodLauMis330.Transcription:
Syke & sorowe deeplyWepe & morne sadlyPreye &
                    þenk deuoutlyLoue & long contynuely
